hadiths.text: This tradition has also been reported through a different chain of narrators in a similar way. This version says:“Until you see me that I have come out”. Abu dawud said: No one except Ma’mar has narrated the words “that I have come out”. And the version transmitted by Ibn ‘Uyainah from Ma’mar does not mention the words “that I have come out”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الصَّلاَةِ تُقَامُ وَلَمْ يَأْتِ الإِمَامُ يَنْتَظِرُونَهُ قُعُودًا
chapter.eng-name: People Sitting After The Iqamah While Waiting For The Imam If He Has Not Come
